title: Post-it Super StickyWall Pad, 20 in x 23 in, White, 20 Sheets/Pad, Mounts to Surfaces with Command Strips Included, 1 Pad/Pack (566SS)
description: It’s an amazing feeling when your team just clicks—everyone feels a shared drive toward success. But, how do you ignite that feeling on every team? Capture the spark at your next meeting with Post-it Super Sticky Easel Pads. Adhesive-backed sheets stick and re-stick to most wall surfaces, unlike flip chart paper. The paper resists marker bleed through so you can capture input by writing directly on the sheet. Use with Post-it Super Sticky Notes to organize ideas. Whenever you want to brainstorm, present, or track projects, they're ready to help you succeed.
